effects: Physical damage (4.2x, ATK) to one enemy
Increase chance of being targeted by 75% for 3 turns
name: Savage Blade

desc_short.0: Damage one enemy, boost damage after using fast blade, and temporarily increase chance of being targeted for self
desc_short.5: Daña a un enemigo, aumenta el daño tras usar Cuchilla veloz y aumenta la posibilidad de que el usuario sea atacado
